description: Minimal span of set of n elements with no 6-term arithmetic progression.
links: B. E. Brown and D. M. Gordon, On sequences without geometric progressions, Math. Comp. 65 (1996), no. 216, 1749-1754.
Sean A. Irvine, Example sets for a(6)-a(38)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _David W. Wilson_, May 15 1997
